headline.main: Big Problem to Be Solved; Fair Distribution of Relief Supplies Will Be Difficult Task

lead_paragraph: As social adviser to the City of Budapest after the first World War I was in charge of directing the distribution of American supplies among middleclass people. I never was in greater difficulty than when I had to select from among so many needy families the most meritorious, because all marshaled special influence.
abstract: Lr on UNRRA as model for internatl soc justice agency
